greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) is Sum_{d|n} d^(d^k * n/d).
formula: L.g.f. of column k: -log(Product_{j>=1} (1 - j^(j^k) * x^j)^(1/j)).
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := DivisorSum[n, #^(n * #^(k-1)) &]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 1, 7}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 09 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 16 2019
